data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Trang, Thailand be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trang, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Trang, Thailand to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 154 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 612,800 souls in Trang and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 612,800 citizens of Trang, Thailand, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Mal people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Mal people know you.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Trang, Thailand. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Trang, Thailand to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.section_summary:
the state of Trang, Thailand has a population of 612,800.

We estimate Trang has 3,962 people who might know Jesus, 4,045 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 604,793 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Trang. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;
